name: bookmark-bar-switcher
description: A Chrome extension for switching between different bookmark bar states (Personal, Work, Development, etc.)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run minify && npm run package
scripts.copy: npm run copy:src && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:src: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/background/background.js dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.js dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/ && cp src/popup/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/ && cp -r src/utils dist/
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs dist/background.js -o dist/background.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs dist/popup.js -o dist/popup.js --compress --mangle
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build
